bibl.title: Privatization and Subdivision of Urban Properties in the Early Byzantine Centuries: Social and Cultural Implications.

series.title: Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists
BASP

bibl.note: See pp. 30-43: the evidence of the papyri. Leases of parts of houses (§j°drai, sumpÒsia, tr€klina, etc.) in the Byzantine period show a progressive compartmentalization of urban dwellings and their transformation into revenue properties. <exedrai, sumposia, triklina>
